extendedInfo.description: Artemis is a digital director's viewfinder designed for cinematographers, directors, and anyone interested in filmmaking, photography, cameras, and film. Artemis works in much the same way as a traditional director's viewfinder but more accurately and with many more features.If you have any issues please email us anytime for support. We are very happy to help!android@chemicalwedding.tvBy selecting your camera, an aspect ratio and a list of lenses, Artemis allows you to compose shots with the same field of view as the camera/lenses you will be shooting with. You can then save images, complete with focal length, GPS data, compass heading, tilt and roll, date and time, camera/lens information, and much more. A great tool for any level of filmmaker, Artemis is perfect for location scouting, storyboarding, blocking, rehearsal and preproduction.For lenses wider than the your devices camera's field of view, Artemis adds "padding" on the screen. While this is not ideal, it's our best solution for getting around the limitations of the camera in your device.Artemis has been field tested with every camera in our database to make sure that the field of view is correct. No other multiformat director's viewfinder has as many camera specific formats or lens sets.Please note that field of view is measured from the "nodal point", roughly mid way down the length of the lens, in keeping with the method used by lens manufacturers. ***Major update coming soon! With new user interface, custom camera calibration, custom lenses, and many other new useful features!***Camera Formats Include:-Film-35mm Film Standard, Super & Anamorphic16mm Film Standard, Super & 1.3 Anamorphic8mm Film Standard, Super, 1.36 & 1.44 65mm Film-35mm Digital-ARRI Alexa, Alexa Plus, Studio, D-21RED One, Red Epic, ScarletSony F35, F3, F65, NEX-10Panavision GenesisDigital StillsCanon 1D, 5DMkII & 7D, C300Nikon D seiresPentax series-High Speed Digital-Phantom HD, 7.3, 710, 9.0, 10,  FlexWeisscam HS-1,2-2/3" Digital-Thompson ViperVaricamSI 2KSony F23Sony SRW-9000-1/2" Digital- Sony EX3 & EX1-1/3" Digital-Panasonic HVX200Sony HDR-FX1, HDR-Z1U*Also you can add any Custom Camera manually*Lens Sets Included:Generic 35mm & 16mm LensesCooke PanchroCooke S4/iCooke S5/iPanavision PrimoPanavision Primo DigitalPanavision System 65Zeiss Master PrimesZeiss StandardZeiss Super SpeedZeiss Ultra PrimesZeiss DigiPrimesZeiss SLR LensesZeiss/Arriflex 65mm primesZeiss Compact PrimesLeica Summilux-CElite S series Mk1vHawk V-Lite 1.3x AnamorphicsRed ProCanon HD-ECCanon EF CompatibleFujinon E-SeriesGeneric DSLR LensesBausch & Lomb Super BalterSchneider Cine-Xenar MkIINikon Dx & Fx CompatibleAnd many others...If your camera format or desired lens set isn't included or you believe a camera format isn't working for you, we include a custom camera feature that allows you to configure Artemis to any camera system. You can even send us the format data and we may include it in our next update.PLEASE, DON'T BE SHYIf you have ANY problems or Artemis DOESN"T somehow perform as you expect, EMAIL US. Most issues are easily resolved, please report them to us, with as much detail as to what you were doing at the time of the issue. We really value your feedback and are always willing to accomodate our customers.*Known Bugs*-Some Sony Xperia devices have trouble calculating FOV of on board camera automatically. Manually enter in settings:H - 51.2V - 39.4To fix issue.*If you like the app, please rate it.*  THANKS!!Email us anytime for support:android@chemicalwedding.tvThanks,-Chemical Wedding Team-

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Update works well. Please polish the UI
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible with htc one
reviews.comment: It takes forever to open and even when it does it doesn\'t save photos and changes the view that I never know how to quiy. This app doesn\'t work well with htc one.
reviews.author: Eunsoo Robin Cho

reviews.title: Crashing all the time!
reviews.comment: Whenever I take the picture for the second time it crashes. The plus and minus buttons disappears some times when I try to change the lens even if there are enough lenses to change. I am using a moto Atrix 2 mobile with Android 4.04. I  have send a crash report. Please respond , I have shoot approaching soon.
reviews.author: reghu shanker

reviews.title: Split screen
reviews.comment: Better. Still some issues. Sometimes the camera view splits into 3 rectangles. 1 large square on the right and then two small rectangles on the left. Unfortunately the bottom rectangle shows black so one can\'t see the image. Trying to take a screen shot so I can share this bug with you. Excellent developer response.
reviews.author: Manu Anand

reviews.title: Good App Limited By Your Phones Cam
reviews.comment: Installed this app on my Xperia P. Worked quite OK. Had to callibrate the view angles of my phones cam manually. But the app itself given lateral and vertical tilt angles so it can be done. 16:9 aspect ratio given me maximum wide angle 25mm and 3:2 (full frame dslr still) only 51mm at its widest. Other than that accuracy and features were satisfactory.
reviews.author: Himantha Yasawardana

reviews.title: Fantastic application and support from creators
reviews.comment: I use this on a Galaxy s4....The artemis team were fast at responding to inquiries that I made, offer advice and solve small issues with my phone in such a short time. I would highly recommend this application to anyone in production.  A+++++
reviews.author: Jeremy Reagan

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I am using it in my galaxy note 2 and it works pretty well I love it!
reviews.author: Ammar Quteineh

reviews.title: Not worth the money
reviews.comment: For an app that costs \302\24320 it lacks simple functions, the gallery can only hold one picture at a time, obviously when location scouting you want to store more than one picture at a time. Don\'t buy this app.
reviews.author: Thomas Ford

reviews.title: Ignorance
reviews.comment: People who don\'t know how to use a gallery should avoid photography, filmmaking, and especially location scouting for such. I work in Film, TV, and commercials and use Artemis for every job even if its as simple as testing a camera move. This is the most useful app for production on the Android market to date.
reviews.author: Emilie Palamides

reviews.title: K\304\201rlis
reviews.comment: The best app for preproduction and production.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing idea
reviews.comment: This is amazing. Innovatung. Genius. Thanks for bringing to android.
reviews.author: Ed David

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Some minor annoyances in a few places, would be nice have favorite lens and camera setups for multi camera shoots, but otherwise a great addition to any kit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Invaluable!!
reviews.comment: I am a TV drama director and I can no longer live without Artemis both in prep and on the set.  Support (my fault, not Artemis\') was immediate and spot on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Significant improvements, worth the cost
reviews.comment: I just tried the newest release for Ice cream and the app has greatly improved since I first bought it.  It now works flawlessly on all my Android devices including the galaxy nexus and the new nexus 7, and also works great on my 10 inch Acer a500 with ICS.  I\'m very impressed with how well the new update performs and the devs have been responsive about my prior issues and requested fixes.  This app is very handy if you work in film and cameras!  I am exited to see what new features are added next  :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very good follow up.....by the artemis team!!!!
reviews.comment: hi, grt feedback frm the team. Some initial technical setback on my galaxy note was quickly fixed by the artemis team. now the new improved versions works completely fine and i think this is one of the best apps for the film makers, DOP\'s ...... however some settings if it helps to capture video clips instead of only still images (as it is right now) would really help in further improving this app......cheers  would look forward to any new improvements and up gradation of the apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hi guys
reviews.comment: This app sucks,  I work in the tv and film industry and it is not worth buying it is a serious waste of money, don\'t buy it!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome application and the last update really makes it up-to-date!
reviews.author: A Google User
